description: Episode of Series "The Facts Are These". Investigates drug addiction among the under twenties. Includes group discussion with registered addicts at a hospital in Birmingham, showing their apathy and disgust. Considers the effects on the families of addicts. Points out the dangers of becoming hooked by experimentation.
